page.title: 05My Family
page.content: My father's name is Mr B Phillips. His job is at Glaxo Factory. He works different shifts. His part-time job is a Fireman. At the back of the station there is a practice tower which is about 25 ft and every Thursday night they put their gear on and have to climb about half way up with the hose. This is practice for when any high building is on fire. My mother's name is Mrs P Phillips. Her job is a cleaner. She cleans Balmain Court. The days she works are Monday, Thursdays and Fridays. On Mondays she cleans the windows, on Thursdays she scrubs floor and on Friday she "Hoovers", polishes and cleans the windows of the lounge. My brothers name is Ralph Phillips. He is in the army. His regiment is the RAOC. He is still in Boy's service, but next year he will be in Men's.
